subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: As L.S.U. makes its fourth consecutive appearance in the women’s Final Four, interim coach Bob Starkey finds himself in the odd position of being undefeated and perhaps soon unemployed.
snippet: As L.S.U. makes its fourth consecutive appearance in the women’s Final Four, interim coach Bob Starkey finds himself in the odd position of being undefeated and perhaps soon unemployed.
